title: A Minecraft Inspired Experience
intro1: Hello! I'm a developer building immersive web experiences. You've just spawned into my digital world.
intro2: Here you can explore my projects, check my stats (skills), and craft new connections.
project_1_desc: Premium potion e-commerce platform. Buy Splash Potions of Healing, Invisibility, and Fire Resistance with instant delivery via Phantom.
project_2_desc: DeFi trading platform for Villagers. Swap Emeralds, Wheat, and Leather with zero gas fees (just angry noises).
project_3_desc: SaaS dashboard for monitoring automated farms. Track mobs/hour, iron yield, and tick efficiency in utilizing charts.
project_4_desc: Book Elytra flights across biomes. Find the safest routes avoiding Phantom airspace and thunderstorm chunks.
project_5_desc: Insurance tech for your builds. Automated claims processing when Creepers blow up your chest room.
project_6_desc: Compose music using only Redstone inputs. Export your tracks to .schematic format for in-game construction.
